subject: Pedals Pro - Warranty Inquiry and Troubleshooting Assistance
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Support Team,

I'm writing to seek assistance with my Pedals Pro that I purchased from
AliExpress approximately one month ago. The pedals worked perfectly fine
for the first month, but they have suddenly stopped functioning entirely.

I wanted to reach out to inquire about the following:

1. Does the warranty cover units purchased through AliExpress, and if so,
what is the process for filing a warranty claim?

2. Are there any troubleshooting steps you'd recommend I try before
proceeding with a warranty claim? I want to make sure it's not something
simple I can resolve on my own.

3. If the issue requires repair or replacement, what would be the next
steps?

I've been very satisfied with the product up until this point, so I'm
hoping we can get this resolved. Please let me know what information you
need from me to assist with this issue.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Best regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Jan Meyer,      Please provide your order number. Did you purchase it from our official SIMSONN website store? Also, which pedal model do you have? You can also enter recovery mode and manually update the firmware to test.

Hi,

Thank you for your reply.

I purchased the *SPRO-P3-H3* pedals from your *official SIMSONN AliExpress
store*.
Order number: *3040293577530321*.

You mentioned entering recovery mode and manually updating the firmware.
Could you please explain:

How to enter recovery mode on this pedal controller

Where I can download the correct firmware (and which version you recommend)

Thank you for your support.

Best regards,
Jan Meyer

Am Mi., 14. Jan. 2026 um 02:26 Uhr schrieb service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com>:

Hi Jan Meyer,    I can see that your pedals were purchased in April 2024, which means they are now outside the 1-year warranty period. Please record a video showing the issue and upload it to Google Drive, then send me the link and set the sharing permission to “Anyone with the link can view.” This will help us identify the cause and provide the best solution.  If your device is running v1.7.1, please download and install SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3 first. The software may show a message like “version too old.” In that case, please manually update the firmware via: Settings → Update → Manual firmware update → pedals → firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.  After the firmware update, please recalibrate the pedals and test again to confirm whether the readings return to normal.         https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
